plot: The story of a poor Brahmin who is forced to take alms from so-called lower castes and the impact it has on him and his family from those around him.
title: Tiladaanam
plot_es: The story of a poor Brahmin who is forced to take alms from so-called lower castes and the impact it has on him and his family from those around him.
plot_en: The story of a poor Brahmin who is forced to take alms from so-called lower castes and the impact it has on him and his family from those around him.

produce.name: National Film Development Corporation of India (NFDC)
